hero.title: Privacy policy
hero.subtitle: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use SotA Research.

collect.title: 1. Information we collect
collect.body: We collect the data needed to operate the platform and improve the experience:
items: Account data: name, email address, and membership preference.
Platform activity: lines visited, releases viewed, and administrative actions.
Technical information: IP address, device settings, and access logs.

use.title: 2. How we use information
use.body: We use your data to operate and improve our services, including:
items: Authenticating users and providing the right access levels.
Personalizing recommendations and measuring content relevance.
Monitoring platform usage, detecting abuse, and maintaining security.

share.title: 3. Sharing with third parties
share.body: We do not sell personal information. We only share data when strictly necessary to:
items: Process authentication and secure storage through our cloud providers.
Comply with legal requirements or respond to lawful requests.
Integrate aggregated analytics tools to understand platform performance.

security.title: 4. Security and retention
security.body: We implement technical and organizational controls to protect your data. Administrative access is audited and sensitive records are stored encrypted. We retain information while you have an active account or as long as required for legal obligations.

rights.title: 5. Your rights
rights.body: You can access, update, or delete your information from the platform or by emailing
